recipe_name: Cucumber ribbon salad with lime and sesame
author: Maria Elia
method: Combine the cucumber, sesame oil, lime juice and sesame seeds together in a bowl. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 cucumber, cut into ribbons using a potato peeler,  2 tbsp sesame oil,  Â½ lime, juice only,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
